nodes.text: A droid assassin masquerading as a detective was one of the two lead characters of a phono-play that existed during the Galactic Civil War. The other lead character, ADAM, was a fictional artificial intelligence that inhabited the droid's head. Grand Admiral Rae Sloane attempted to listen to the phono-play while on Chandrila the night before she was due to commence peace talks with the New Republic, but considered the work a "potboiler" and failed to connect with the characters.
